name: TeenAgent
content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the file TEENAGENT.EXE
game:
  game_id: teenagent
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      src_path=$(echo "$1" | sed -r "s/(.+)\/.+/\1/")

      find "$src_path" -type f \( -iname "*.DAT" -o -iname "*.RES"  \) -exec cp {}
      "$dst" \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: $game $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
